column1: # Consolidated Auto Insurance Risk and Claims Dataset - Synthetic Data Generated by AI for Demonstration Purposes
# for use in customer risk profiling
column3: and claims pattern analysis. All data is artificial and AI-generated.

column1: # occupation: Job category for risk assessment
# state: State where policy is active (2-letter code)
# zip_code: ZIP code for geographic risk analysis
# vehicle_value: Current market value of vehicle ($)
# prior_claims: Number of claims in last 5 years
# violations_last_3_years: Traffic violations in last 3 years
# total_claims_filed: Total number of claims filed
# total_claim_amount: Total dollar amount of claims ($)
# injury_claims: Number of bodily injury claims
# property_damage_claims: Number of property damage claims
